Question: Obi-Wan Kenobi tells Luke Skywalker that this person is a former Jedi who "betrayed and murdered" Luke's father.
Hints: On their list of the 100 Greatest Fictional Characters, Fandomania.com ranked this person at number 6.
On June 22, 2006, U.S Vice President Dick Cheney referred to himself as the ____ of the Bush administration.
In the satirical cartoon show Lil' Bush, Dick Cheney's father is portrayed as being this person.
